类型: Size: 12.5 Wide Women/11.5 Wide MenColor: Light Grey
评论详情: I've been converting my "normal" footwear (cushion, heel to toe drop, and pointy toes) to barefoot shoes the past year, and I've been trying to find a brand that is wide enough at the balls of my feet, because most of them aren't quite wide enough. I've tried Altra, Xero, Vivo, Lems, and none of them are quite wide enough. I need about 4.5 inches at the balls of my feet, and most of these brands are around 4 inches wide at that area. These Hobibear shoes fit perfectly. They are lightweight and very soft as well. The only thing I didn't care for was the memory foam insole, but I simply took them out and put in some wool felt insoles, and now they're the best barefoot shoes I've put on my feet. I would highly recommend if you've been disappointed with the width of other barefoot shoe brands.

类型: Size: 8 Wide Women/7 Wide MenColor: Wine Red
评论详情: I love the shoes. My second one pair! I've ordered two more. I wear a 7.5 to 8. I bought an 8. Plenty of room for my feet. Very comfortable! They feel like I'm walking barefoot, in shoes. My feet, knees and hips don't get tired or achy. I'm a real goer so that's critical for me. (Bye-Bye to most of my Skechers!) Well worth the purchase.

评论概述: Converted to Wide Toe Box Life
类型: Size: 8 Wide Women/7 Wide MenColor: Black/Brown
评论详情: I have wide feet, bunions, and history of plantar fasciitis, so I’d been researching the wide toe box options for a while. I didn’t want to dive in headlong with an expensive shoe from the get go so I bought these to test drive the wide toe box. Now I never want to go back to anything but a wide toe box because of these shoes. The first time I wore them for more than a trip to the mail box was to the state fair- where I spent all day walking. By the end of the day the only pain was just the general dull ache of being on my feet for 10+ hours and even that seemed minimal compared to previous shoes. My toes had so much space to expand and breathe! Usually in the hours or the next day after being on my feet that much my feet are still sore and achy from being chafed and squeezed, but I was ready to go because I didn’t feel any discomfort. They’re lightweight and have good traction. Because they’re zero soles I could feel the ground beneath me which was sometimes strange since my history of thick-soled shoes usually meant no ground-feeling. Overall I feel it helped prevent tripping, which I’m prone to do. I’ve had them for about a month and a half and haven’t noticed any wear, which is also impressive since I wear them almost every day now.

类型: Size: 12 Wide Women/11 Wide MenColor: Grey/Brown
评论详情: I love these shoes.  I have CIPN.  They help with my balance and allow room for late day feet swelling.

类型: Size: 9 Wide Women/8 Wide MenColor: Black/Brown
评论详情: I bought these in February (wear every day) and was definitely expecting them to fall apart after a couple of months at the most. Almost a year later and they're still in perfect condition 👀  You can see the glue a bit between the sole and fabric, but they've been like that since day one.  They are super comfortable and have actually cleared up the pain in my feet. My toes have room to wiggle which I appreciate. Turns out sometimes the best foot support is no support?  My feet were sore the first few days after wearing them. But it was a good sore, like underutilized muscles being activated.  If you really care about style, the visible glue will be a turn off, though it's not very noticeable imo.  I wasn't expecting much from some no-brand Chinese shoes but these are really, really good. Plan on getting more colors to be able to match a little better.

评论概述: The most  comfortable shoes I've owned in years...
类型: Size: 9 Wide Women/8 Wide MenColor: Black
评论详情: These are great for working around the house, and even for casual outings. Very easy on the feet! If you wear high heels for an extended period of time, come home and put these Hobibear shoes on. You'll feel like you're in heaven!

类型: Size: 12 Wide Women/11 Wide MenColor: Black/Brown
评论详情: I have chronic foot pain and have been searching for shoes for my wide feet These shoes are incredibly comfortable! The fit was exactly my size, and are really stable and slip-resistant on wet pavement. I'm going to buy more so I can have them in several colors. I highly recommend them.

I recommend trying these out to give your toes a break and some room for movement.

评论概述: SO COMFORTABLE and true to size !
类型: Size: 8 Wide Women/7 Wide MenColor: Orange
评论详情: I just received these today and they are so comfortable!  I love to be barefoot especially when indoors but these were so comfortable when I put them on that I left them on....for HOURS...which I never do indoors.  I can't speak to how they will hold up in the long run but they seem well-constructed.  The style is so cute.  They have managed to make a wide toe box look adorable rather than clownish or frumpy.  I recently discovered the joy of zero drop/wide toe box shoes and now find anything else hurts my feet.  So I have undertaken the expensive journey of replacing all my shoes so I have been looking at a LOT of shoes in this category.  Most of them are at least triple the price of these (if not more !) and nowhere near as cute.  The size seemed exactly true.  I know Amazon is recommending they run small and are often returned but I don't know why.  For me as a normal size 8, the size 8 was perfect.  I am wondering if they are returned often because of Amazon's advise to buy bigger when that may not be needed?  Thus far I have bought zero drop/wide toe box without adding the barefoot or minimalist element so was a little worried that I may not like these.  The worry was for no reason as they seem to have plenty of padding.  As someone who goes barefoot all the time, this doesn't feel barefoot to me.  It's not ad though I am going to feel rocks under my feet.  They are just so very comfortable, stylish, and affordable.  I am thrilled !

类型: Size: 10 Wide Women/9 Wide MenColor: Black/Grey
评论详情: I love, love, love these shoes. The comfort from the wide toe box is amazing and great for walking. I also have them in gray and white and hope to purchase more colors in the future.

评论概述: Most comfortable shoe I have ever worn

评论详情: I have awful problem feet.  After finding these and noting that they do not not cause me pain,  I wear them almost everyday.  They easily have room for my high arch orthotics and give my feet room to move naturally.  I love the square toe box, gives my first and second toes lots of room with no friction, which is rare. More and more, I am meeting people who know about barefoot shoes and love them.  Highly recommend.

评论概述: Most comfortable barefoot shoe I’ve ever worn
类型: Size: 11 Wide Women/10 Wide MenColor: Grey/Brown
评论详情: I’ve been wearing barefoot and zero drop / wide toe box shoes for about a decade. Vibram five fingers, and a range of shoes from Merrill, Altra, Topo, Xero and vivobarefoot.  I started my barefoot journey because I have a foot condition called halux rigidous. My feet are very sensitive to toe movement (needs to be unrestricted and independent). These are the equal of any of the others I have worn in that regard.  But the clincher here is that these hobegear shoes have great ground feel with an uncanny bit of cushion that still transmits the exact right amount of “real world”. Making them the most comfortable of the shoes that have barefoot feel (I.e Merrill Vivo, Xero)  And they are crazy well made. They look good (pass the wife and work colleague test) feel solid in their traction (only quibble - like other barefoot shoes slippery on smooth wet surfaces). Truthfully I would consider them a good value at twice the price.  Don’t understand Amazon guidance on size - these fit true to size for me.

类型: Size: 10 Wide Women/9 Wide MenColor: Light Grey
评论详情: Love these shoes! The wide toe box suits my wide feet, and they are super comfortable. They’re pretty much the only shoes I wear now.

类型: Size: 8 Wide Women/7 Wide MenColor: Black/Grey
评论详情: Love my Hobibears!! They are so comfy and my feet can breathe!

I am retirement age and my feet have been bothering me more and more over the years. I have not been to a podiatrist but from online research I am pretty sure I have a high arch, hammer toes and tailor's bunions (swelling by the little toe instead of the big toe). So with most shoes my toes feel squashed and my feet feel unhappy. I ordered these shoes just to see if a wide toe box would help. Went for a long walk in them today to break them in and my toes feel happy and my whole foot feels better than usual. I got the orange color which is so cute but I may order them in another color. They don't have a lot of support but I am going to add an arch support and the roomy feeling of the shoe more than makes up for it. I would definitely recommend these cute shoes.

类型: Size: 8 Wide Women/7 Wide MenColor: Light Grey
评论详情: I ordered a little bigger and for me, it is a perfect fit.  I ordered two pairs of Whitins and maybe they have a wider shoe, but I could not find it. I sent them back because they were too narrow. All the negative reviews of these shoes seemed to be based on a misunderstanding of what barefoot shoes are meant to look and feel like. Wide toe box, minimal cushioning, and no support to allow your feet to feel the ground. As for me, my feet and toes are deformed from the many years I had to squish my poor feet into work heels and even running shoes. I can use my toe expanders as well. For the price, they are by far the best shoes for me.

Out of curiosity I had her try mine on and she was able to wear these shoes and have enough length in the laces to tie them. I approve!👍

类型: Size: 12 Wide Women/11 Wide MenColor: Black/Brown
评论详情: I LOVE these shoes. As a woman with wide feet it can be hard to find shoes that fit comfortably and look nice. I prefer to run barefoot but these shoes are so comfortable I’ll happily keep them on all day. They seem to have good grip and be of good quality.

评论概述: Added stability for me and my wide feet
类型: Size: 11 Wide Women/10 Wide MenColor: Black
评论详情: It does take some adjusting, you can definitely feel more impact compared with cushioned shoes, and I would not recommend them on rough terrain. That said, these have helped me with some imbalance/instability by allowed my feet to spread out and function more naturally.

评论概述: My feet have never hurt this bad before....
类型: Size: 10 Wide Women/9 Wide MenColor: Black/Brown
评论详情: I was so excited for these because I saw a video about them being amazing for people who are flat footed. I don't stand on my feet all day at work like a lot of people but I do walk around a lot on concrete floors. These are horrible. I was hoping I would get used to them....not even a little. In fact, I've notice the last couple days, my ankles are now hurting too. I don't know if it's just me or what but I've even worn dress shoes to work and it didn't hurt this bad. So disappointed...I'm giving 2 stars because I love the way they look and they go with pretty much everything and I do like how they are light.

类型: Size: 9 Wide Women/8 Wide MenColor: Orange
评论详情: I've been struggling with plantar fasciitis for a few months and after I heard someone say it was due to poor muscle development in my feet from too much arch support in my shoes...well I ended up trialing these to see if they would really help. These particular shoes don't look obviously different than a standard loafer with laces. They have a nice dress-casual look, although the toe did smack a little on the tile as I walked down the hall at work, reminding me of my children walking. On the trail, I could feel the ground beneath my feet and felt more secure walking the rugged and sloped terrain, which was really unexpected. They are comfortable, though wearing them definitely works my feet and my calves more than other shoes, which fatigues the muscles, but has already improved my plantar fasciitis. I don't know how long they will last, but at this price I have no reservations in recommending them. I will definitely be shopping for more zero drop shoes. I want to be walking for many years to come.

评论概述: Wide toe bed and no other benefits
类型: Size: 8 Wide Women/7 Wide MenColor: Black/Grey
评论详情: I ordered this because it’s got a wider toe bed which is great as you get older, except there’s no other benefit to this shoe. No support or comfort whatsoever.

类型: Size: 6 Wide Women/5 Wide MenColor: Black/White
评论详情: Absolutely recommend if you have bunions.

类型: Size: 10 Wide Women/9 Wide MenColor: Light Grey
评论详情: I can wear these shoes all day long and feet do not sting or a burning feeling.  Just like wear slippers.  I f you are barefoot most of the time, these shoes will work for you.

类型: Size: 9 Wide Women/8 Wide MenColor: Wine Red
评论详情: These shoes feel great on my feet. They have been washed several times and still look new. I have worn them for hikes up mountains, long walks on pavement, and all around the house. They have a hundred miles on them and look like they will be around for a couple hundred more! I will be buying these again in the future, very pleased!

评论概述: Comfy but not for a full day
类型: Size: 9 Wide Women/8 Wide MenColor: Black
评论详情: I saw these shoes on TikTok and my picky feet was intrigued. I have caveman flat feet and weak ankles so shopping for shoes can be exhausting.  I have a ton of shoes I had to retire early because they’ve been causing joint pain and fatigue after a few days and weeks trying to break them in. I tried my Hobibears for the first time and they were light as a feathers and fit comfortably. I wore them to do errands and they felt okay. They felt comfy if I was just standing. I’m generally a fast walker but these make me feel like I was speed-walking on sand, but they’re still comfy. The support is weak.  I would definitely not wear these at Disneyland from open to close. I plan on taking these to a Cruise. So, for full-day use I’ll rate this 3 stars but for comfort it’s 5 stars.

类型: Size: 8 Wide Women/7 Wide MenColor: White
评论详情: I love this shoe.  For this order I ordered a 7-1/2W, my normal size is 8M.  The shoes are great for quick trips to store or wearing when I won't be walking a lot.  You can feel the ground underneath (especially rocks) which eliminates them for long walks for me).  Cute and quirky!
